userreviews.userReview: THIS IS DESCRIBED AS THE SERPENT KING MEETS STRANGER THINGS.AND IT'S BY EMILY HENRY.the fact that it is not currently in my possession is my new least favorite thing about the world.
A book about a bunch of weirdos who love each other but aren't always great at it.

"Pitched as The Serpent King meets Stranger Things, this YA novel follows a group of friends in a small town who find themselves dealing with unexpected powers after a cosmic event."I CAN'T BREATHE.Don't you dare letting me down, book. Don't you dare.

description: Pitched as The Serpent King meets Stranger Things, this YA novel follows a group of friends in a small town who find themselves dealing with unexpected powers after a cosmic event.
title: When The Sky Fell on Splendor
